GameConsole.Core

类 WindowMain

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameConsole.Core.WindowMain
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class WindowMain
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    This class is to display the interface of the game where the player can visually perform game operations.
